content.p: For the reservation of a corporate name pursuant to section three\nhundred three of this chapter, twenty dollars.\n

For the resignation of a registered agent for service of process
pursuant to section three hundred five of this chapter, and for the
resignation for receipt for process pursuant to section three hundred
six-A of this chapter, sixty dollars.
For service of process on the secretary of state pursuant to\nsection three hundred six, paragraph

of section three hundred six-A,
or three hundred seven of this chapter, forty dollars. No fee shall be
collected for process served on behalf of a county, city, town or
village or other political subdivision of the state.
For filing a certificate of incorporation pursuant to section four\nhundred two of this chapter, one hundred twenty-five dollars.\n
For filing a certificate of amendment pursuant to section eight\nhundred five of this chapter, sixty dollars.\n
For filing a certificate of change pursuant to paragraph
of\nsection eight hundred five-A of this chapter, thirty dollars, and for\nfiling a certificate of change pursuant to paragraph
of section\neight hundred five-A of this chapter, five dollars.\n
For filing a restated certificate of incorporation pursuant to\nsection eight hundred seven of this chapter, sixty dollars.\n

For filing a certificate of merger or consolidation pursuant to\nsection nine hundred four of this chapter, or a certificate of exchange\npursuant to section nine hundred thirteen (other than paragraph
of\nsection nine hundred thirteen) of this chapter, sixty dollars.\n
For filing a certificate of merger of a subsidiary corporation\npursuant to section nine hundred five of this chapter, or a certificate\nof exchange pursuant to paragraph
of section nine hundred thirteen\nof this chapter, sixty dollars.\n

For filing a certificate of merger or consolidation pursuant to
section nine hundred four-a of this chapter, a certificate of merger or
consolidation pursuant to section nine hundred four-b of this chapter,
or a certificate of merger or consolidation of domestic and foreign
corporations pursuant to section nine hundred seven of this chapter,
sixty dollars.
For filing a certificate of dissolution pursuant to section one\nthousand three of this chapter, sixty dollars.\n

For filing an application by a foreign corporation for authority
to do business in New York state pursuant to section thirteen hundred
four of this chapter, two hundred twenty-five dollars.

For filing a certificate of amendment of an application for
authority by a foreign corporation pursuant to section thirteen hundred
nine of this chapter, sixty dollars.
For filing a certificate of change of application for authority by\na foreign corporation pursuant to paragraph
of section thirteen\nhundred nine-A of this chapter, thirty dollars, and for filing a\ncertificate of change pursuant to paragraph
of section thirteen\nhundred nine-A of this chapter, five dollars.\n
For filing a certificate of surrender of authority pursuant to\nsection thirteen hundred ten of this chapter, sixty dollars.\n

For filing a statement of the termination of existence of a
foreign corporation pursuant to section thirteen hundred eleven of this
chapter, sixty dollars. There shall be no fee for the filing by an
authorized officer of the jurisdiction of incorporation of a foreign
corporation of a certificate that the foreign corporation has been
dissolved or its authority or existence has been otherwise terminated or
cancelled in the jurisdiction of its incorporation.

For filing a certificate of incorporation by a professional
service corporation pursuant to section fifteen hundred three of this
chapter, one hundred twenty-five dollars.

For filing a statement or amendment pursuant to section four
hundred eight of this chapter with the department of state, nine
dollars. This fee shall not apply to statements submitted through the
department of taxation and finance pursuant to paragraph eight of
section four hundred eight of this chapter.
For filing any other certificate or instrument, sixty dollars.\n
